website_summaries.verdict: Water-resistant and durable kinesiology tape that stays in place for a few days.
pros: Offers consistency and thickness similar to skin to give the right level of support and freedom of movement
Design promotes air circulation for more comfortable feel and to decrease skin irritation
cons: Doesn't stay in place as well as some other tapes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no irritation
customer_reviews.text: I have to use this tape to help my plantar fasciitis heal. I place it and leave it on for around two days before removing and replacing. Degrades around the edges quickly when wet. The adhesive leaves no residue after removal, and I have had ZERO irritation. I guess this is why my Doctor recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Marzano

customer_reviews.title: What a blessing this tape has been for my planter ...
customer_reviews.text: What a blessing this tape has been for my planter fasciitis. I was able to pull the big toe into position while easing the stress on the arch of the foot. Not sure if it "increased" blood flow to the area, but I do know that my healing (no pun intended) was quicker than those who did not use the tape.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: BUY KINESIO, it's great stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great tape, I've found of all the colors the Black holds the absolute best. I have purchased the Red, Blue and Black. I love the ability to intermix the colors and make wearing it fun. I will be wearing it for years due to a Lymphatic Disease, so why not make it fun? Attaching a pic of the crazy stuff my fabulous PT Tech does.
customer_reviews.author: Angie O

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I used the Kinesio Tex ver. The quality is as expected: good adhesion and muscle relief quality. In terms of packaging and delivery, the tapes are packed clean and delivered quickly, very good merchant. I shall recommend the product and the merchant for people who wishes to buy a Kinesio tape.
customer_reviews.author: flo.k.

customer_reviews.title: easy to take off
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fabulous!!! I have issues with my knees and use this stuff all the time....fabulous - stays on...easy to take off. (Note: if you have residual adhesive left on your skin when you remove it...using a piece of the tape (adhesive side) rub across the residue and it should pull the remaining adhesive from your skin.)
customer_reviews.author: ACW

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things about this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of Kinesio TxGold. This time I ordered the black tape. It is more durable and longer lasting. The tan only stayed in place thru all day in shoes and one shower. The black lasts atleast 3 showers, 2 of the days were yard work (in Texas)...A Rat Terrier puppy negates all of the above. Can't say enough good things about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin B

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: It's the only thing that works for my back pain.
customer_reviews.author: sonyu

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this
customer_reviews.text: I have heel pain, so I have been ordering almost everything under the sun to relieve my pain. This tape does not stay on as well as the white athletic tape, so I am ordering the athletic tape. Also, it is not as tight and supportive for my heel pain. I have found so far the athletic tape has eased my pain, and it is tighter with more support. Maybe I am not taping with the kinesio tape correctly, so I am going to watch a few you tube videos to see if I can do something different to relieve the pain. But, I have only used the kinesio tape one time. Maybe it takes time.
customer_reviews.author: txtrayce

customer_reviews.title: Stabalizes
customer_reviews.text: Great in stabilizing body parts such a s shoulders and knees. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kiki1471

customer_reviews.title: Love this kinesio tape
customer_reviews.text: Love this kinesio tape. I have had experience with RockTape and other kinesio brands but everything pales in comparison to the quality of this tape. This tape lasts longer which allows it to work more effectively than other brands. Don't waste your money on RockTape, buy this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: good stuff, I use this on myself all the ...
customer_reviews.text: good stuff, I use this on myself all the time. I've heard RockTape might give more resistance and hold, but the science is iffy as it is on this stuff, and it feels good when I'm sore from biking too much so I go with it.
customer_reviews.author: bikesingread

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Too thin to put on. Hard to hold its shape to put it on
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Sport tape
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. It gives just the right support to my knees and it stays on through showers for 3-5 days. The sticky stuff that remains from the edges when you take it off comes right off using the removed tape sticky side to wipe it off. Have used other tapes and for my needs this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inpressed with Kinesio
customer_reviews.text: My PT strarted using Kinesio tape on me it's worked so well I decided to purchase my own. This tape is thin which is nice. The price is very good and the tape is very useable and seems to adhere well. When properly applied works great. Still amazing how this works on the sore and injured body parts. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ginia

customer_reviews.title: No Noticeable Benefit
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I both tried this Kinesio tape for various injuries. We even looked at a lot of illustrations to make sure we were applying it correctly. After several applications we both agreed that there was no noticeable improvement or benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Draven

customer_reviews.title: The 2 orders the adhesive sucked. Order theraband brand
customer_reviews.text: The original is the original. The 2 orders the adhesive sucked. Order theraband brand. @ptguy1
customer_reviews.author: Josue De La O

customer_reviews.title: Favorite K tape so far
customer_reviews.text: Has better staying power than the Ktape available at the drug store and for a better price. I use A LOT of tape, and I will definitely be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband feels this helps his knee pain, as long as you know how to use it properly. Thanks for providing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Donahue

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Like this kinesiology tape. It definitely helps with my joint pain. The only downside is getting it to last up to 3 days. The price is a lot cheaper than the competitors in the store.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Kinesio Gold
customer_reviews.text: Can you say Kinesio Gold. This product work after four days of using it, my leg started to feel better and you can take a shower with which made it better. The only downfall is removing it. I felt like I was waxing my leg...
customer_reviews.author: R Delish

customer_reviews.title: Provided needed support
customer_reviews.text: Provided better support than Ktape on a thumb trigger finger issue. Needed to keep more ridged.
customer_reviews.author: alice mcmartin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Support
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort of knowing that I have support when I run, and this tape is key. My PT introduced me to this tape and although, I try not to use it as a crutch, it serves it's purpose during those long drawn out runs. A must have for serious runners who need those extra miles.
customer_reviews.author: Teen Hearts Polish

customer_reviews.title: After trying another brand of tape I am really happy to a found this one it works the best ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact tape my physical therapist uses at her office. After trying another brand of tape I am really happy to a found this one it works the best with the fingertip technology etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Inman

customer_reviews.title: Better adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I think it is better than KT tape. Better adhesive quality.
customer_reviews.author: michael Moretti

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this for track and he has sworn by it for a few years now....however, one night, my neck was sore and he put some on me, I was totally shocked at how it great it worked. Will make sure he has it at all times in his locker and sports bags.
customer_reviews.author: DAINA

customer_reviews.title: It is a much better product and stays put for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Used other Kinesio tape before but it did not stay on very well. This product was recomended by my physicial therapists so I tryed it. It is a much better product and stays put for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: I can put tape on it and its good as new
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble with my ankles swelling on the sides. I can put this on and within a few hours the swelling is gone. I usually wear it 3-4 days, leave off a day and then start it back for severe issues. I had my knee reconstructed a year ago and it sometimes swells also. I can put tape on it and its good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tape is magic. It absolutely takes pain away ...
customer_reviews.text: This tape is magic. It absolutely takes pain away when put in proper place.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: Really does make q difference, and this really is ...
customer_reviews.text: Really does make q difference, and this really is sweaty proof. I even wrote it under Capri work out leggings and even with the added friction it didn't budge. (ITB injury)
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is great.
customer_reviews.text: I am a PT and we are supplied wit KT tape vis tge company for patient care, but I wanted my own little stash for taping myself... this stuff is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Only color different from the gold
customer_reviews.text: LIke the gold, but I am not that fond of the black color. I think it is a little heavier than the gold as well. so works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for joint pain
customer_reviews.text: I've used this tape for some years now. It sticks well to your skin, and stimulates the circulation of blood and lymphatic fluids. Good for joint pain, muscle pain, neck pain, even head ache. Works so fast, it seems like a miracle. This is a must to have at home, in your gym bag etc.
customer_reviews.author: Atolsen

customer_reviews.title: I love this tape
customer_reviews.text: I love this tape, I've tried a few products until I found this one, and I mainly like that it just sticks...and sticks well for a few days even after getting it wet. I wear these on my knee after suffering a slight patella tendon tear that didn't need surgery. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Herv P.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tape! I have a weak ankle and I am able to run without a brace and worry that I will continue to reinjure it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time in my profession. Not sure exactly how it works, but athletes seems to think that it helps them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Berglund

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few of the later generation tape and still cannot find a better solution for the taping this product offers.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product! It sticks and lasts like it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: AmyR

customer_reviews.title: used it for my first marathon - loved it
customer_reviews.text: worked well, I used the Kinesio tape for my first marathon - helped me with recovery time.i would buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Holds well
customer_reviews.text: There is a video on you tube that shows the proper way to use the tape. Very helpful video. Tape lasts beyond 1-2 showers.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Urban

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as directed by a PT doc for our athletic club. Works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of handling and taking pressur off of my knee.
customer_reviews.text: The tape was very helpful to take pressure off of my knee. Very pleased

customer_reviews.title: good performance product
customer_reviews.text: Get consistent performance from this product. Always adheres well. No complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Great tape!
customer_reviews.text: High Quality Kinesiotape, and it does not make my clients itch!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Great tape
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my therapist and I love it. No issues even when I'm in the shower. It sticks and stays
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t last long at all...and I’m qualified to apply the product. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: William Z Garrett

customer_reviews.title: this item sucks. i even shaved my arm to put it ...
customer_reviews.text: this item sucks. i even shaved my arm to put it on. an hour later and 5 minutes into working out the thing fell right off.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Stayed on 4-7 days (I washed area with rubbing alcohol to remove any oils first.) Provided good support and comfort (esp. for neck) and really speeded up healing time. Used on back of neck, shoulder and knees.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product, first used in physical therapy and continue to use daily
customer_reviews.author: Kevin mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is simply amazing. Helped me a lot while having plantar fasciitis, back pain, and sprained ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Malv

customer_reviews.title: what an amazing item.
customer_reviews.text: I learned about this tape from my therapist. He taught me how to use it and i'm amazed at how well it works. Great product.!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Same good product....wrong color
customer_reviews.text: The order was for black tape, however, pink or flesh colored was received. It will work.....just not what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Kinesio's great
customer_reviews.text: Really helped after having a total hip replacement with a tired muscle during physical therapy and walking. Use even now if going to be walking a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mae

customer_reviews.title: The best tape product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I would buy a much larger roll. The quality of this tape and the stickyness is amazing. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Murphy

customer_reviews.title: POLO
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT ANY WHERE ON YOUR BODY. I USED IT ALL OVER MY LEGS AND SHOULDER. USING THE KINESIO TAPING METHOD I CUT OUT DIFFERENT SHAPES AND PATTERNS. YOU MUST TRY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: POLO

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: This tape is awesome. It arrived quickly and was exactly what I ordered. This tape is amazing for my knees-can't run without it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Zuhlke

customer_reviews.title: great tape
customer_reviews.text: this tape is a godsend,it really does the trick,on tired aching sore muscles just put some kinesio tape on and the results are amazing.the added blood flow helps to alleivate the soreness and help to go pain free throughout your day
customer_reviews.author: FrankieD

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: This made my foot itch and irritated the arch of my foot. The tape was not strong enough to help alleviate my plantar faciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Came as promised with as little packaging as needed. Nothing worse than a giant box for a tiny thing. Use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Ildiko Paulovits

customer_reviews.title: Kinesio Tex tape
customer_reviews.text: Kinesio tape is amazing and the price is affordable. I would recommend this product to friend & family. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kallatta  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great tape -- great support
customer_reviews.text: I researched this type of tape thoroughly and bought this tape in black, pink (I think they called it red) and beige. The black works better hands down though the pink was pretty good. After I apply it, I use a hair dryer to help the adhesive stick better -- if I don't do this it rolls when I wear jeans. I use this on my knees and it not only gives support but helps ease the pain. Just recently I bought another brand that Amazon had on sale -- it did adhere well, but did not give the support.
customer_reviews.author: I-Reader

customer_reviews.title: has the worst adhesive. Tape start peeling off in a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I used Rocktape, KT Tape, and KT Tape Pro Extreme and now kinesio Tex gold. This tape, kinesio Tex gold, has the worst adhesive. Tape start peeling off in a few hours. Of the other tapes, KT tape pro extreme has the best adhesive. Tapes stayed on for several days but it’s expensive. Rocktape has the best balance of price and adhesive. Rocktape stays on for about 2-3 days. Regular KT tape stays on about 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I tape frequently and I prefer this tape now because: 1. it stretches and I can adjust the tension and allow for swelling. 2. It is breathable and therefore, I do not have to use something under it to protect the skin. 3. If properly applied to skin that has been washed with simple soap and dried well, it will stay on for up to a week or more 4. It holds up well in water sports and even when walking on it barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my physical therpist reccomended (not this brand). I researched many of them before deciding on this one. I guess I decided wrong. It doesn't stick very good, I was useing it on my thighs just in a strip going down. I made sure my legs were cleaned good before application. I rounded the courners, and made sure I didn't stretch it to much. Regular pants or workout pant it didn't matter it still would not stay stuck on my skin. I know there are some out there that will hold up to everyday use. After my physical therpy applied what they had, it stayed on for 2-3 days even while showering.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Quality is NOT good
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past, but this recent purchase is disappointing. The quality of the tape is not good. It started to roll up on the edges just 2 days after application. Now I have 2 rolls of this stuff to use. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Some people have adhesive reactions and I am not one ...
customer_reviews.text: Some people have adhesive reactions and I am not one of those people. I can wear this product for multiple days and shower with it on. It stays on my skin for as long as a week. I pull it off after a week only because I am worried that it smells but my wife says she doesn't notice. I utilize this product on my ankles, shins, and lower back. It very well could be a placebo but I swear the extra support, although minimal, is enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gerber

customer_reviews.title: stops pain, super water proof, very little irritation
customer_reviews.text: My wife wears this tape and by far this is the best you can get. My wife tells me it works so well with her pain and it holds up to water, my wife works 3 12 hour shifts in a row (3showers) and she is able to use the same tape for the three days. My wife has tried other tapes but have irritated her skin. This stuff irritates a little bit but what isn't gonna bother your skin after a few days. Husband approved lol. Look no future put this in your cart with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm allergic to the adhesive because I developed a hell of a rash.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Great tape
customer_reviews.text: It is great! Wears good unless swimming but does well in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Wilhoit

customer_reviews.title: BEST athletic tape Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best athletic tape EVER. Works superb, stays on for multiple events, even if wet. Easy peel off. The competitor, K-Tape is a cheap rip off. Difficult to apply, starts peeling right away, but does not peel off without tearing at your skin. Stick to the real deal - Buy Kinesio Tex!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My OT recommended this tape. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tape. Easy to apply. Sticks. No problem with glue/tape on skin.
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Kinesio tape hard to come by. Good for the money. Great support.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist recommended it because I am allergic to most tapes and she said I wouldn't be allergic to this one and it's wonderful I have been using it for several months no redness no itching fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: sandy roe

customer_reviews.title: The only Kinesio tape :-)
customer_reviews.text: This is the only kinesio tape for me. I've tried others and none of them have the staying power to last through sweat, movement, etc. Most of them are just too thin. If you want a product that actually does something for support and that will actually stay in place while you are working out, this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: ama48

customer_reviews.title: It is excellent and stays on with sweat and lots of movement
customer_reviews.text: Due to an ankle injury a year ago and continuing to do Crossfit, I rely on this tape to support and reduce swelling. It is excellent and stays on with sweat and lots of movement.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Brazil

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years starting at my chiropractor for arthritis in my hands (thumbs) and for my husband's injured shoulder. It's a great product as long as you use it properly. Very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winning Value
customer_reviews.text: Just what my physical therapist wanted me to use at half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Nell

customer_reviews.title: Good Tape
customer_reviews.text: This tape really works great if you know how to use it. I had a PT stop over and he showed me how to wrap my feet and ankles. It serves its purpose, but if you aren't familiar w/ proper procedure, you need to research that first, or find someone who has experience with this type of wrap. Once applied, it's very functional
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my knees and achilles tendon on long runs and ultras. Have also used it successfully to blister proof some sensitive areas on my feet. It is important, however, to put the tape on well ahead of the time when you start your activity. I normally tape the evening before.
customer_reviews.author: Hefv

customer_reviews.title: We have ordered this item before to use in my ...
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered this item before to use in my practice and the staff loves them. I believe we will order again when the opportunity presents itself.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Truth

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by my physical therapist for me after arthroscopic surgery ...
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my physical therapist for me after arthroscopic surgery on my knee. I don't know how it works, but it does! Great videos on You Tube help!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Bikowski

customer_reviews.title: This tape relieves a lot of my pain
customer_reviews.text: I have MS and very bad Neuropathy. This tape relieves a lot of my pain and helps weak and atrophying muscles to get stronger. I would be on a lot more pain medication if it were not for this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite KT tape
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite KT tape. It adheres better and resists water saturation more than any other brand that I have tried. The tape stays flexible for 4-5 days and doesn't lose its elasticity.
customer_reviews.author: Sarav

customer_reviews.title: The taping helps but I really think the black holds better.
customer_reviews.text: Physical Therapist has been taping my foot for ankle problems. She used the black tape and the beige tape. The taping helps but I really think the black holds better.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Mc

customer_reviews.title: Injured my achilles and used the tape to help with ...
customer_reviews.text: Injured my achilles and used the tape to help with rehab. Could feel a difference and still use it when i'm in need of a little TLC or have to go for a long run.
customer_reviews.author: Some Dude from Delaware

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Tape, but I really like the bigger roll better3..
customer_reviews.author: David  C. Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I personally think the KT tape holds a bit better, but my daughter's chiropractor swears by this brand. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Like2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: My trainer showed me how to apply Kinesio tape after I developed jumpers knee. I couldn't believe how much pressure was removed off the knee after I continued to rehab. If you don't have a trainer, there are some great how-to videos on YouTube.I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It sticks so well that it would be painful to take off dry
customer_reviews.text: This brand sticks very well and stays on through days of sweating and showering. It sticks so well that it would be painful to take off dry. I tried some KTtape.com strips and those did not adhere well enough.
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Lammlein

customer_reviews.title: I have tried 3 other brands and this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.text: It stays on for several days and does not irritate my skin. I have tried 3 other brands and this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: my painted lady

customer_reviews.title: great tape
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten this tape several times, not necessarily from this seller, and its worked great and stayed on several days. This tape only stays on a day! Must be they sold outdated tape!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black Kinesio Tape. I would have been pretty irritated if I'd received anything else. I knew what to expect because I was already using the product, a name-brand product that is excellent. The seller provided a very fast shipment. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I find the black kinesiotape most effective and I use it on clients, family members, and myself.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: recomended by my physical therapist and surgeon. Just be aware that it will pull your hair.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps with the lower back and wrists. Very effective for me.

customer_reviews.title: it is great for chronic pain
customer_reviews.text: if you know how to put the tape on, it is great for chronic pain. things like tennis elbow ,or sore shoulders ,I love it.
customer_reviews.author: LORI

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it's supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: This is a top rated kinesio tape. I'm hypersensitive to latex and this product does not have any latex. My lymphadema therapist, who is also a physical therapist, really likes this tape better than other brands. As far as tape goes, this would also be my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: MaryGold511

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! My pelvis separated while I was pregnant. After I had my baby chiropractor suggested I use it...it was a miracle! I was able to walk again bend and even work out! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Meir G.

customer_reviews.title: Sort of worked, but...
customer_reviews.text: It helped a little with quadricep muscle pain but would often start peeling off after one day. I used the sticky spray and that made it peel off even quicker!
customer_reviews.author: Faison

customer_reviews.title: really works !!
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand how but... it really works !!!!!!!!!!!!! you will love it if you are a runner for me its fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Constandce

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: such a great alternative to bulky and uncomfortable braces, and it works better than they do, too. Good to work with physical theray
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

product_meta.title: Kinesio Taping - Kinesiology Tape Tex Gold FP - 2 Pack - Black - 2 in.
product_meta.description: Color:BlackKinesio Tape - Tex Tape Kinesio Tape is a super thin athletic tape, about the same thickness and the elasticity of skin and muscles. Kinesio Tape is made of a porous cotton fabric with a medical grade acrylic adhesive that allows the skin under the tape to breathe be cleaned while showering. Kinesio Tape uses a special method of adhesive application combined with the porous nature of the fabric works 'with' your body. The Kinesio taping method provides a full range of motion, support, and stability, without adversely affecting the natural range of motion. Kinesio tape is designed for a 30-40%% longitudinal only stretch and when applied, it lifts the skin and provides support for surrounding soft tissue. This Kinesio Tape is LATEX FREE and NON-MEDICATED. Kinesio Tex Tape was designed to be worn for 3 to 4 days without irritation; and an hour after application it will withstand athletic activity and showering without coming off. The water resistant type of taping Kinesio offers is necessary for the taping of hands and feet. Proper application does not require multiple layers; due to location of muscles, an application may cross over another application. What Does Kinesio Taping Do? Kinesio Tape gives support and stability to your joints and muscles without affecting circulation and range of motion. It is also used for Preventive Maintenance, Edema, and Pain Management. It is a taping technique based on the body's own natural healing process. This Kinesio Taping exhibits its efficacy through the activation of neurological and circulatory systems. This method basically stems from the science of Kinesiology, hence the name Kinesio. Muscles are not only attributed to the movements of the body but also control the circulation of venous and lymph flows, body temperature, etc.
feature_bullets: Water-resistant and durable--each application lasts 3-4 days
Very light, with a thickness similar to that of skin
Gold Wave pattern promotes air circulation
140% elasticity with a heat-activated adhesive and latex-free
